code: @Test public void checkProducerBeanInjection() {     AbstractApplicationContext applicationContext = createApplicationContext().     MyProduceBean bean = applicationContext.getBean("myProduceBean", MyProduceBean.class).     assertNotNull("The producerTemplate should not be null.", bean.getProducerTemplate()).     assertEquals("Get a wrong response", "Camel rocks!", bean.getProducerTemplate().requestBody("Camel")). }
